verbs.description: [V: rose] [ARG1: mallinger 97] remembered as warm kind a staple of tree of life almost every saturday most synagogues will read a prayer for peace nation shall not lift up sword against nation the prayer says neither shall we learn war anymore a staple of tree of life rose mallinger had the honor of leading the congregation in that prayer every saturday judy danenberg is a lifelong member of tree of life and says rose mallinger loved her synagogue her community and her family we heard some speeches today about life rose mallinger pittsburgh rose mother emmanuel church judy danenberg tree of life
